general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Utah Clean Energy provides Model Solar Permit for municipalities. Salt Lake City offers online solar permitting.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Rocky Mountain Power net metering with export credit rate. Rate has been declining over recent years.
interconnection.fees: Rocky Mountain Power interconnection fee varies

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Utah Code 57-13a-102 protects solar access rights.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Local review required in historic districts.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 85-100 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Significant snow loads in mountain areas. Wasatch Front 30-60 psf.

licensing.license_type: Utah DOPL licensed contractor required. Electrical contractor license for electrical work.

notes: Growing solar market. PE stamps typically required for systems >12 kW in Salt Lake City metro. Model Solar Permit toolkit available for municipalities.
